participant_1.background:
My favorite TV shows are the ones I can watch with my dog.
my mom taught me how to play the cello.
I've been estranged from my parents for many years.
i love to hike in the summer.
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I've never been in a fight, but I'm not afraid to stand up for myself.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I like to spend my summers in warmer climates.
I lost my brother when he was in a submarine accident.
i hate the taste of cheese.

content.text: Hey I am really excited for the summer!
Me too! I love spending time in warmer climates. What are your plans?
I am going to spend time with my family and friends and hike a lot!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am also going to spend time with my family and friends, but I am going to spend more time in the woods.
That sounds really nice! I love to spend time in the woods too. I used to spend hours in them when I was a kid.
Me too! I used to make up stories and worlds in the woods. I think that is where my love of writing came from.
That's so cool! I love writing too. I used to play the cello when I was a kid. My mom taught me how to play.
That's awesome! I have never played an instrument before. I have always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
You should! It's so much fun! I used to play the cello with my dog. He would sit next to me and listen to me play.
That sounds really cute! I wish I had a dog. I would love to have a dog to play with.
I love dogs! They are the best companions. I am going to go spend some time with my dog now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! It was nice talking to you! Have a great day
